message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you 400k, and I'll take 600k. What do you say?
You're being too generous, I'll take the majority this time
You're trying to take the majority, but I'm not giving up yet. I'll give you 580k, and I'll take 420k. It's a fair deal considering the inflation.
I'm getting greedy, you're getting desperate. This is my best offer
I'm not desperate yet. I'll give you 640k, and I'll take 360k. It's a fair deal considering the inflation.
You're running out of time, I'm taking control
I'm making a last-ditch effort. I'll give you 850k, and I'll take 150k. It's a desperate attempt to salvage something.
